Dataset

The interactive part will be based on the marathon dataset while the exercises will be based on the lowbwt dataset. Datasets in different format ar available here.

They are related to the following publications:

  • Hyponatremia among Runners in the Boston Marathon, N Engl J Med 2005;352:1550-6
